conclusions.heading: Conclusions
conclusions.first_sentence: The fractal dimension analysis shows higher values in the trabecular and condylar bone (ROIs 3 and 5) compared to cortical bone (ROI 4) in both the study sample and their healthy matched controls.
conclusions.first_100_chars: The fractal dimension analysis shows higher values in the trabecular and condylar bone (ROIs 3 and 5
conclusions.last_sentence: The results presented should be expanded in future studies with a larger sample of patients with OI, allowing for a greater number of subjects in each group to increase the statistical power of the findings.
conclusions.last_100_chars: ng for a greater number of subjects in each group to increase the statistical power of the findings.
